title: Airbnb said more than 800,000 people flocked to its careers page after it announced that employees could live and work anywhere - Yahoo Finance
content: Airbnb said more than 800,000 people flocked to its careers page after it announced that employees could live and work anywhere  Yahoo Finance
description: The company also said employees could work for up to 90 days a year overseas, although they will still need a permanent address for tax and payroll purposes.
